title: New: Wez – The Mood Changes
body:
Photo: Daniel Dorsa

Ultra-smooth debut track from Austin’s **Wez**, who coincidently isn’t just a great songwriter, but also a great guy, as past SXSW experiences confirm.

There’s a definite sadness in the tone of _The Mood Changes_, documenting those fleeting, often rare moments of true human connection, and the circumstances within which they occur, all played out across a slick production background. Check it out below.
